name: Archetype - Chapter 3 Sacred Scales - Toro
additionalNotes: The Archetype Chapter 3 Sacred Scale is a full-strength cigar that is hand rolled in the Dominican Republic. Ventura Cigars and Ernesto Perez-Carrillo Jr. collaborated in creating this special blend. The Chapter 3 Sacred Scale has a dark Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper that covers an Ecuadorian binder and premium fillers from Nicaragua. The Archetype Chapter 3 Sacred Scale is a full-bodied smoke with a spicy, sweet flavor and a smooth draw.
